notes.text: Under certain circumstances, an unauthenticated user could access the Metasys ADS/ADX/OAS web API and enumerate users.CVE-2021-36200 has been assigned to this vulnerability. A CVSS v3 base score of 5.3 has been calculated; the CVSS vector string is (AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:L/I:N/A:N).
